template<class POINTLIKE>
float calcAngle (  const POINTLIKE &  pl0,
const POINTLIKE &  pl1,
const POINTLIKE &  pl2
) 
 

Calculates the angle between the three points.

The resulting angle is between 0 and 360 degrees, and increases counter clockwise.

template<class ITERATOR>
bool selfIntersecting (  const ITERATOR &  begin,
const ITERATOR &  end
) 
 

Check if the closed polygon is self intersecting in such a way that the orientation of the polygon is not constant, i.e.

it is twisted. Does not work for polylines.

Returns:
If the polygon is self intersecting.

Returns true if a polygon is self-intersecting.

Complexity is O(n^2)
